snippet: The health insurer pushed up its yearly forecast, but not enough to prevent a drop of 8.1 percent in the company’s shares.
abstract: Humana Inc reports first-quarter profit of $248 million, or $1.49 a share, down 21 percent from $315 million, or $1.86 a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue rose 11 percent to $10.2 billion.
lead_paragraph: The health insurer pushed up its yearly forecast, but not enough to prevent a drop of 8.1 percent in the company’s shares.
